Description:
Comfortable Family Living
Located in a quiet court in a popular pocket of Corio sits this solid 3 bedroom home, ideal for a first home or investment. Close to all the amenities needed with Corio Village Shopping less than a 5 min drive, local schools, park lands & public transport within very close reach!
-3 great sized rooms with BIRs and ceiling fans
-Large sunny lounge with ceiling fan
-Functional kitchen with gas cooking adjoining a meals area with split system A/C
-Large covered entertaining area
-Huge 4 car garage with workshop space
-Potential rental return of $295p/w
Inspect today before you miss out!

Description:
Downsizers Delight
Conveniently positioned to public transport and in close proximity to Corio Village Shopping Centre is this immaculate 2 bedroom unit. Situated at the rear of this well maintained complex of 5 units, privacy and security is assured.
The design of the unit is open and provides light filled living with the comfort of gas heating & S/S air-conditioning as well as ceiling fans in all rooms. The kitchen is extremely spacious with S/S appliances and provides access to the outdoor entertaining area plus plenty of room for established gardens and a perfect option for pet owners.
The 2 bedrooms are generous in size and provide BIRs and serviced by bathroom and separate laundry facilities. A single lock up garage completes this excellent unit which is sure to impress. The perfect choice for investors seeking high returns on investment or retirees/downsizers wanting an affordable property without compromising on comfort and style.
Insights: 2/209-211 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
As Soon as You Step Inside You'll Feel Right at Home
You will be amazed as soon as you step inside this spacious two bedroom home with its warm chic interiors oozing comfort at every turn. The functional floorplan seamlessly escorts you through the light soaked layout beginning with the inviting living space that beautifully adjoins the modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and pantry.
Both bedrooms are ample in size and space and offer built in robes.
A wonderful surprise of sun-splashed yet serene outdoor spaces are revealed behind the glass sliding doors from the dining zone.
With its own deck and undercover alfresco this is an ideal space to host friends and family in style. With the added tranquillity of landscaped gardens, bamboo lined side fences, an additional paved yard continues around to the garden shed, clothes line and the large single lock up garage with rear access. You will love how low maintenance this property is - no mower required!
Further enhanced by split system heating and cooling, additional gas heater in the living room, irrigation system that provides for the front and rear gardens and a misting system under the pergola.
This home offers more than meets the eye and the location adds to the appeal in an ideal pocket of Corio. Walking distance to just about everything you could want and need - schools, shops, medical facilities, public transport; and undeniably easy reach to the Ring Road and beyond.
This gem is the perfect downsizer, savvy investment or ideal first home.
An inspection is sure to impress the fussiest of buyers.
Home Owner âGreat access to Melbourne, the location has everything you need and fantastic neighbours!â
Roncon Real Estate - An Agency like no other!

Convenient Investment!
This family home is conveniently located close to schools and public transport. It offers a large lounge room, great sized kitchen/meals area and three good sized bedrooms (two with built in robes), plus an updated bathroom which includes a separate shower and bath. Other features include gas ducted heating and a good sized rear yard. With easy access to Melbourne, Corio Village shopping centre and lots more, this home is ideal for the first home buyer or investors! Leased at $280 per week.

Description:
Your next investment purchase is right here in Cloverdale
An ideal investment opportunity or first home buyer prospect perfectly positioned in the ever popular Cloverdale Estate awaits its new home owner or investor.
This well presented three bedroom home features a functional and spacious lounge flowing through to the central dining and kitchen with gas stove and ample bench space. Keeping you comfortable all year round with modern conveniences such as central ducted heating, split system air conditioning & wall heater.
All three bedrooms include built in robes and main bedroom incorporates an en-suite. The remaining two bedrooms are serviced with the main bathroom & separate toilet, with the laundry located at the rear.
Outside a large grassed backyard with a well maintained garden, accompanied with a large single car garage with side gate access to the rear yard.
This very affordable home is short distance to Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and is walking distance to local schools. Ideal for the savvy investor, with a current rental return of $310 per week and a lease in place until August 2017.

Description:
Fantastic Family Living!
This stately and refined 5BR residence promises quality living at every turn. From the moment you open the front door to this modern brick veneer home, you will be welcomed with character & charm. Situated in a quiet court, this versatile property situated on a large 679sqm approx. allotment will tick all the boxes for any growing family, first home buyer or investor. This property was designed with spacious living, privacy and entertaining in mind incorporating open plan living zones, rumpus room, and an impressive sheltered outdoor entertaining area ideal for hosting year round dinner parties. Quality features are paramount at this light-filled home with ducted heating, split system air conditioning and drive-through access to the rear yard via the double remote garage. Meticulously presented inside and out, the home comprises five comfortable bedrooms (all with robes) easily accessible to the central bathroom located adjacent the laundry, while the master bedroom comes complete with generous walk-in-robe and ensuite. Situated at the centre of the home the stylish kitchen contains large pantry, stainless steel appliances and island bench which overlooks the meals area. Designed for large families, the functional space of this home are second to none and provide room for the whole family. Perfectly located close to the Ring Road for Melbourne commuters, easy access to public transport, schools for all ages as well as just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre what more could you want?
Insights: 8 Genista Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Beautiful Family Living or First Home Opportunity!"
If you're looking for a family home you can move straight in to, your search is now over. With plenty of space for the family, this stunning home is sure to suit first home buyers, families and investors alike. Built on a generous 546sqm corner block (approx.) this property was designed with spacious living, privacy and entertaining in mind incorporating open plan living areas & an impressive sheltered outdoor entertaining area ideal for hosting year round dinner parties. The home comprises of 3 generously sized bedrooms with BIR's and ceiling fans, central bathroom. A spacious living area at the front of the residence flows through to the central kitchen with meals area that provides large sliding doors leading out into a large fully landscaped backyard. Towards the rear of the property lies a double garage with extra space for a work shop. With a great location, this property has all the major amenities at its fingertips! Just around the corner you have access to the Geelong Ring Road, Bell Post Shopping Centre, sporting complex.

Catching public transport is a breeze with multiple bus routes accessible close by and Corio Train station within easy reach. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to secure this charming home simply bursting with potential, enquire today!

Description:
Incredible Family Home with Plenty of Space!
If you're looking for a fresh start then this spacious, pleasantly presented 3BR home in Corio is just the place to provide you with a comfortable and convenient lifestyle. This home represents a great opportunity for first home buyers to secure a family home with all the hard work already complete or even for those looking to upgrade from their current property to an amazing asset ideal for entertaining year round.
Recently renovated through-out the home provides a large front lounge which provides access through to the family sized kitchen with more than enough bench & cupboard space, designed with functionality in mind and overlooks the adjoining dining area. Centrally located you'll find the over-sized main bathroom including double vanity, separate bath & shower , all
freshly tiled and easily accessible to all 3 spacious bedrooms which come complete with BIR's. You're sure to be impressed by the extensive undercover area, fully enclosed which makes it ideal for year round use, providing plenty of room to entertain family and friends. Situated on a large 695m2 approx. allotment the home offers a generous amount of rear yard as well as an impressive 4 car garage complete with remote control door, drive-through access & WC perfect for car enthusiasts or for additional storage if required.
Appealing to families and first homebuyers this spectacular home is in close to proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre & short distance to Shell Reserve. Public transport is easily accessible as well as Corio train station, minutes drive to Geelong's CBD and just around the corner from the Ring Road for Melbourne commuters it doesn't get much better than this. A quality home of this standard packed full of value does not come to market often, do not miss your chance to secure this prime piece of real estate today!

Description:
Neat, Sweet and Complete
First time on the market in 36 years is this much loved 3 bedroom family home. Greeted by a private porch perfect to sit on and watch the tree leaves blow in the breeze. As you walk through the front door stunning hardwood floorboards feature throughout. The lounge has a capturing gas log fire and reverse cycle split system.
Open plan kitchen has been updated with stainless steel gas appliances and rear yard views! All bedrooms are spacious and 2 have built in robes. Renovated bathroom with shower, single vanity basin and toilet. Laundry has backyard access and 2nd toilet. Out the back has a decked pergola entertainment area, double garage and plenty of yard for kids or pets to roam free. A single carport and plenty of off street parking adds to the value here! Quiet location with no through traffic ticks yet another box, also close to schools, shopping centers, medical facilities, public transport and easy access to the ring road.

In the heart of Cloverdale - Corio's best location, this sensational town house has been brilliantly designed with practicality & functionality in mind containing stunning finishes and extras throughout. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to enter the market place, perfect if you're searching for a first home, an investment property or if you're looking to downsize in style.
-2 bedrooms
- Large living areas
- Privacy
- Impressive presentation
- Bright and practical two way central bathroom
- Complete with gas ducted heating & split system air conditioning
- Italian Tiles
- Eletric oven with gas cooktop
- Security system
- Large single garage with remote control roller door
- Quality fittings and much more!
Close to Bell Post Shopping Centre, schools for all ages, public transport and easy access to the Ring Road.

Description:
"Live Better For Less!"
Situated close to shopping centres and public transport, you have all the amenities at your fingertips while remaining in a quiet court location. Plus, with easy access to the Geelong ring road only minutes away, commuting to Melbourne, Geelong or the surf coast is a breeze.
This home has everything that you need; boasting a double lock up garage with internal access, 4 generous sized bedrooms all with BIRs, including a spacious master with ensuite and WIR, as well as an open plan kitchen/dining area fitted with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar and an abundance of cupboard space. From there you can access one of two light-filled living rooms with the potential to convert one into a fifth bedroom or study.
Bringing both indoors and outdoors together via a large alfresco dining area and backyard, flowing seamlessly from the kitchen and living area, makes this property both family friendly and an entertainers delight.
The vendor has made it clear that this property must be SOLD, so book your inspection today and secure your spot in the magnificent Rose Park Estate.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Situated in a sought after pocket of Corio, this home will meet your checklist!
With public transport as little as a 5 min walk away, convenience store just around the corner, Corio Central Shopping Centre just a 3 min drive or respectable walk.
Also in the vicinity of the area?s best schools including Northern Bay Colleges multiple campuses, Geelong Baptist College & more.
-3 bedrooms all with built in robes

Description:
Move In & Enjoy!
Set on a corner allotment with landscaped exterior and decked portico, this newly renovated family home has been rewired and plumbed. Cleverly designed to maximise space, features include three bedrooms and an open plan living zone with floorboards throughout. This property is further enhanced by an updated kitchen with electric appliances, a modernised central bathroom and laundry with ample storage. An enclosed carport with remote control adds to its appeal. Located in a prominent position close to the Ring Road and walking distance to Corio Village shopping centre and minutes to the ring road this is an opportunity not to be missed!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Entertainers Delight In Quiet Court Locale
If entertaining is high on your priority list then this lovely 3 bedroom home is sure to delight & a must to inspect. Well maintained & freshly painted throughout, the main bedroom offers a full ensuite & all 3 bedrooms have built in robes. The two living areas, both with split system reverse cycle air conditioners, are drenched in Northern sun & separated by the functional kitchen offering electric wall oven, gas cook top, pantry & dishwasher. For those who love outdoor living the huge pergola area will be a favourite gathering place & with the bonus of the lined games room/ man cave, entertaining all year round is covered. A storage/workshop area at the rear keeps everything safe & secure. Plenty of off-street parking, double gates to close off the good sized, low maintenance yard for the kids & pets complete this value packed property. Located within easy reach of the ring road, shopping centre, schools, transport & services this represents great buying for both owner occupiers & investors.
Insights: 10 Sten Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
